languages.text: "Всегда полезно иметь доверенного человека подле то{mf|го|й}, кто мнит себя выше Лекс Империалис".
"It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Всегда полезно иметь доверенного человека подле то{mf|го|й}, кто мнит себя выше Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: 「自分がレックス・インペリアを超える存在だと思い込んでいるような人物のそばには、信頼できる工作員を配置しておいた方がいい」
languages.original_text: "It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「自分がレックス・インペリアを超える存在だと思い込んでいるような人物のそばには、信頼できる工作員を配置しておいた方がいい」

languages.text: "Es ist immer von Vorteil, einen treuen Agenten in der Nähe von jemandem zu haben, der meint, über dem Lex Imperia zu stehen."
languages.original_text: "It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist immer von Vorteil, einen treuen Agenten in der Nähe von jemandem zu haben, der meint, über dem Lex Imperia zu stehen."

languages.text: « Il est toujours judicieux de placer un élément digne de confiance aux côtés d'une personne puissante qui se pense au-dessus de la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Il est toujours judicieux de placer un élément digne de confiance aux côtés d'une personne puissante qui se pense au-dessus de la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: «Siempre es mejor contar con un agente de confianza junto a alguien que se considera a sí {mf|mismo|misma} por encima de la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre es mejor contar con un agente de confianza junto a alguien que se considera a sí {mf|mismo|misma} por encima de la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: “针对那些自认为有权凌驾于帝国律法之上的人，上面的人需要将值得信赖的特工安置在那些人身边。”
languages.original_text: "It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “针对那些自认为有权凌驾于帝国律法之上的人，上面的人需要将值得信赖的特工安置在那些人身边。”

languages.text: "Kendisini Lex İmperialis'ten büyük gören birinin yanında güvenilir bir ajanın olması daima daha evladır."
languages.original_text: "It's always better to have a trusted operative in place next to someone who considers {mf|himself|herself} above the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Kendisini Lex Imperialis'ten büyük gören birinin yanında güvenilir bir ajanın olması daima daha evladır."
